solveAndDisplay(Problem) - Method in class network.Client
solveAndDisplay function gets a Problem, creates a connection with the server, send the problem to the server.
solveDomain() - Method in interface model.Model
void solveDomain() - solve the domain's problem and notify
solveDomain() - Method in class model.MyModel
SolveDomain method is not relevant to GUI view. suitable for earlier modes (CMD)
A request to solveDomain will initially try to start a connection with the server (according to xml properties)
gets the instance of ProblemManager (singleTone)
it will send the problem to the server and will get the catenated String which will describe the entire problem
finally it will save the problem in the problem manager.
solveDomainAndDisplay() - Method in interface model.Model
void solveDomainAndDisplay() - solve domain and display the solution
solveDomainAndDisplay() - Method in class model.MyModel
The solveDomainAndDisply method is relevant to GUI view!
